attributes.action: We Should Leave The European Union.
attributes.additional_details: The European Union costs our Government Billions and if other Countries get into debt or have any other issues our Country have to get involved. The EU does no good for our Country we should leave. The Government should leave the EU or/and Hold a Referendum to let the British People to decide. Please sign this E-Petition, This will help us have a better country and better ethics.
